IsDeleted.description: Indicates whether the record has been moved to the Recycle Bin (true) or not (false).

ItemId.description: A foreign key field pointing to the Type field that represents either the layout (if Type is set to Layout) or the PathAssistantStepInfo (if Type is set to Information) of this guidance detail.

PathAssistantId.description: ID of the PathAssistant related to this step.

RecordTypeId.description: ID of the record type associated with this path.

Type.description: The type of data that ItemId refers to.Valid values are: Information Layout
